column2: Become the Host Nation
Only click this decision if you are the host/GM!
Show Host Decisions
Click to show all host decisions
Hide Host Decisions
Click to hide all host decisions
Ally All Countries
Click to ally all countries in the game
Unally All Countries
Click to unally all countries in the game
Get Mil Access From All Countries
Click to get mil access from all countries in the game
Remove Mil Access From All Countries
Click to remove mil access from all countries in the game
Transfer Host Nation
Click to transfer the host nation flag to a nation you don't have mil access from
Kick All Players With No Mil Access
Click to kick all players with no mil access in the game
Unsiege All Countries With No Mil Access
Click to unoccupy all non-rebel occupations in countries with no mil access
Choose a Country With no Mil Access to be the Occupier
Click to pick a country with no mil access to be the occupier, after clicking this a new decision will unlock allowing you to choose which countries will be sieged
Siege All Countries With no Mil Access to the Occupier
Click this to siege all countries you do not have mil access with to the occupier you picked earlier
